abortmultipartupload.name: AbortMultipartUpload
abortmultipartupload.description: Grants permission to abort a multipart upload identified by the upload ID

abortvaultlock.name: AbortVaultLock
abortvaultlock.description: Grants permission to abort the vault locking process if the vault lock is not in the Locked state

addtagstovault.name: AddTagsToVault
addtagstovault.description: Grants permission to add the specified tags to a vault

completemultipartupload.name: CompleteMultipartUpload
completemultipartupload.description: Grants permission to complete a multipart upload process

completevaultlock.name: CompleteVaultLock
completevaultlock.description: Grants permission to complete the vault locking process

createvault.name: CreateVault
createvault.description: Grants permission to create a new vault with the specified name

deletearchive.name: DeleteArchive
deletearchive.description: Grants permission to delete an archive from a vault

deletevault.name: DeleteVault
deletevault.description: Grants permission to delete a vault

deletevaultaccesspolicy.name: DeleteVaultAccessPolicy
deletevaultaccesspolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the access policy associated with the specified vault

deletevaultnotifications.name: DeleteVaultNotifications
deletevaultnotifications.description: Grants permission to delete the notification configuration set for a vault

describejob.name: DescribeJob
describejob.description: Grants permission to get information about a job previously initiated

describevault.name: DescribeVault
describevault.description: Grants permission to get information about a vault

getdataretrievalpolicy.name: GetDataRetrievalPolicy
getdataretrievalpolicy.description: Grants permission to get the data retrieval policy

getjoboutput.name: GetJobOutput
getjoboutput.description: Grants permission to download the output of the job specified

getvaultaccesspolicy.name: GetVaultAccessPolicy
getvaultaccesspolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the access-policy subresource set on the vault

getvaultlock.name: GetVaultLock
getvaultlock.description: Grants permission to retrieve attributes from the lock-policy subresource set on the specified vault

getvaultnotifications.name: GetVaultNotifications
getvaultnotifications.description: Grants permission to retrieve the notification-configuration subresource set on the vault

initiatejob.name: InitiateJob
initiatejob.description: Grants permission to initiate a job of the specified type

initiatemultipartupload.name: InitiateMultipartUpload
initiatemultipartupload.description: Grants permission to initiate a multipart upload

initiatevaultlock.name: InitiateVaultLock
initiatevaultlock.description: Grants permission to initiate the vault locking process

listjobs.name: ListJobs
listjobs.description: Grants permission to list jobs for a vault that are in-progress and jobs that have recently finished

listmultipartuploads.name: ListMultipartUploads
listmultipartuploads.description: Grants permission to list in-progress multipart uploads for the specified vault

listparts.name: ListParts
listparts.description: Grants permission to list the parts of an archive that have been uploaded in a specific multipart upload

listprovisionedcapacity.name: ListProvisionedCapacity
listprovisionedcapacity.description: Grants permission to list the provisioned capacity for the specified AWS account

listtagsforvault.name: ListTagsForVault
listtagsforvault.description: Grants permission to list all the tags attached to a vault

listvaults.name: ListVaults
listvaults.description: Grants permission to list all vaults

purchaseprovisionedcapacity.name: PurchaseProvisionedCapacity
purchaseprovisionedcapacity.description: Grants permission to purchases a provisioned capacity unit for an AWS account

removetagsfromvault.name: RemoveTagsFromVault
removetagsfromvault.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from the set of tags attached to a vault

setdataretrievalpolicy.name: SetDataRetrievalPolicy
setdataretrievalpolicy.description: Grants permission to set and then enacts a data retrieval policy in the region specified in the PUT request

setvaultaccesspolicy.name: SetVaultAccessPolicy
setvaultaccesspolicy.description: Grants permission to configure an access policy for a vault; will overwrite an existing policy

setvaultnotifications.name: SetVaultNotifications
setvaultnotifications.description: Grants permission to configure vault notifications

uploadarchive.name: UploadArchive
uploadarchive.description: Grants permission to upload an archive to a vault

uploadmultipartpart.name: UploadMultipartPart
uploadmultipartpart.description: Grants permission to upload a part of an archive
